TopicTitle: make a kerbal story using this song.

Articles.Content:
Well, it's friday, i am slightly drunk, and i love this song, then i think, i'd love to see someone create a narrated kerbal short story to this song. so go!

<iframe width="480" height="270" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/0a5WyAjL1MM?feature=oembed" frameborder="0" allowfullscreen="true"></iframe>
I also suffer from depression, so, come on youtube kerbonaughts, cheer me up ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif).
You doing okay, SmashBrown? Have an internet hug.
